item.description:
domenica 10 aprile · 14.00 - 17.00

Luogo St John's The Evangelist Church 174 Humphrey Street Swampscott, MA

Creato da Kevin Galie'

Maggiori informazioni Kevin Galie', Organ and the Dimitry String Quartet - North American Premiere, Quintet No.2, Padre Antonio Soler

Right on the sea-side across from Hawthorne By the Sea (Anthony's Pier 4) - Newly moved and renovated antique 1850's Stevens Pipe Organ, Eric Andersen, Music Director of the Church - Also a Vivaldi String Quartet with Organ, and solo organ works of Krebs and Boehm. ADMISSION FREE. CONCERT IS 45 MINUTES DURATION.
item.why: Beautiful location across from seaside, free concert, 45 minutes long.
